mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thanks him for sending a copy of his geography; would like to see a comparison of states' produce; neglected to include the College of William and Mary in his list of colleges; regrets he can be of no further help as age prevents study.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1823 March 9, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to Sidney Morse, New Haven, Connecticut.
